title: Getting it right
creator_credit: FM-TV Australia, Equal Employment Opportunity Trust
brief_description: Four scenarios portraying realistic situations in recruitment, counselling, feedback, assessing potential and staff retention. Discusses: job application assumptions, managing subordinates, problems faced by personnel in accepting geographical transfer, ethnicity as a disadvantage in career development, why companies can lose women in management or with management potential.
